effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.
short_effect.emerald: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.
short_effect.colosseum: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.
short_effect.xd: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit.
flavor_text.emerald: A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that is executed last. The user flinches if hit beforehand.
